meanings.sent1: The sunset painted the sky a pinkish hue.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks turned pinkish when she blushed.
meanings.sent3: The pinkish flowers in the garden seemed to be blushing.
meanings.sent4: The pinkish clouds resembled cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pinkish paint on the walls gave the room a warm feeling.

meanings.sent1: The dress had a pinkish tint that complemented her skin tone.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned pinkish as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent3: The pinkish sky made it look like the world was blushing.
meanings.sent4: Her pinkish hair flowed like a river of cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The pinkish glow of the sunrise painted the horizon beautifully.
